name: Nur
about: the PI of the lab, carries scientific curiosity, friend of a cat (Yoda)

name: Alireza
about: is a graduate student in the Mechatronics department. He has a background in Mechanical Engineering and Computational Fluid Dynamics

name: Nilufer
about: received her bachelor's degree in Bioengineering from Istanbul Technical University in 2015. She completed her Master's studies in Bioengineering from Marmara University in 2019 and joined Sabanci University as a Ph.D. candidate in the BIO program

name: Ceren
about: is a senior Molecular Biology Genetics & Bioengieneering student. She desires to become a successful neuroscientist in the future. Sailing, dancing, traveling and modern art are among her hobbies :)
